Upper Body Configuration Detector – version 1

By: Minh Hoai Nguyen (minhhoai@gmail.com)

Date: 20 Mar 2014

Last modified: 18 Apr 2014

Requirements

  • Code for DPM: voc-release5

Compilation

Most of the code is in Matlab, which does not require compiliation. The only function that requires compilation is dt_ramanan.cc for generalize distance transform. We include precompiled binaries for Mac OS 10.9 and Linux 64 bit. If you need to compile the file, open Matlab and run:

> mex dt_ramanan.cc

Demo

> MUB_Demo.demo1()

> MUB_Demo.demo2()

> MUB_Demo.demo3()

> MUB_Demo.demo4()

Limitation

This version contains pretrained models and testing code. Training data and training code will be made available in future release.

Citation

If you find the code useful, please cite:

Hoai, M. & Zisserman, A. (2014) Talking Heads: Detecting Humans and Recognizing Their Interactions. Proceedings of IEEE Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition
